projects.title: A.I.-Automobile Inspector
projects.bodyText:
- AI powered **car visual damage assessment**, and **RAG** based chatbot for customer support. 
 -  Damage detection, costing, and repair services in **5 clicks**. 
 - Flask based application with SQL database. 
 - Complete Full Stack Application with both Computer vision and LLM pipeline.

projects.title: NVson - Noun Verb Syntax Observation Network
projects.bodyText:
- Trained from scratch a POS Tagging **RoBERTa** based model to classify words into previously undefined categories. 
 - Self-annotated a large dataset of 2.5 million words with new POS tags by leveraging GPT to replace human annotators.
 - Classifies nouns into Shape and Non-Shape Nouns, and verbs into Result and Manner Verbs.

projects.title: Atari Pong RL Agent
projects.bodyText:
- **Deep-Q Reinforcement Learning** implementation of Atari Pong using gymnasium environment. 
 - RL Agent continouously wins over the Atari agent.

projects.title: NeuroBeatsDL
projects.bodyText:
- Conditional VAE implementation to **model the influence of binaural beats on brain signals**. 
 - Model accurately identifies if a brain is under the influence of binaural beats or not during a congitive task. 
 Electroencephalogram (EEG) signals preprocessed using MATLAB pipeline.
